snippet.title: The Walking Dead: Saints & Sinners BTS 4 - Survival
snippet.description:
"Ah, ah, ah, ah. Stayin alive." 

The Saints & Sinners development team discusses the various ways you'll be surviving in the Walking Dead. 

Saints & Sinners is a game unlike any other in The Walking Dead universe. Every challenge you face and decision you make is driven by YOU. Fight the undead, scavenge through the flooded ruins of New Orleans, and face gut-wrenching choices for you and the other survivors. Live The Walking Dead's dark drama in your own skin.
 
For news and details on “Saints & Sinners,” sign up at VRWalkingDead.com or follow “WalkingDeadVR” social media for the latest info: 
 
Twitter: https://twitter.com/walkingdeadvr 
Facebook: https://business.facebook.com/Walking...  
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/WalkingDeadVr 

Coverage:

Screenrant: https://bit.ly/2oIvMYf
Games Radar: https://bit.ly/2nZANvz
